item.title: Info
item.description: Welcome Welcome to Arcane Energy’s website. This post gives an overview of this website and some general information. If you have any questions, you can contact me at my email address. About The following frameworks and systems were used to create this website: This website has been created with Hugo v0.91.2 extended. A modified version of the terminal theme. The amazingly simple welcomments commenting system. Embla Carousel to display image carousels.
item.content:
Welcome

Welcome to Arcane Energy’s website. This post gives an overview of this website and some general information. If you have any questions, you can contact me at my email address.

About

The following frameworks and systems were used to create this website:

  • This website has been created with Hugo v0.91.2 extended.
  • A modified version of the terminal theme.
  • The amazingly simple welcomments commenting system.
  • Embla Carousel to display image carousels.
  • Prism for highlighting code syntax.
